successes.title: Cthulhu Wars
successes.description: Cthulhu Wars is a strategy/horror board game from Lovecraft's classic Cthulhu Mythos.

Pledges.description: Investigator - Digital art book, includes wallpapers, art book containing concept art, illustrations, and images of the awesome miniatures!

Options Only - If you want to support the project and are only interested in the optional rewards, select this as your base pledge to cover priority shipping. To add any option to your total pledge, simply increase your pledge amount by the value of the options you want. After the campaign, a survey will allow you to confirm your option selections. ( This also includes the digital artbook! )
Asenath Waite - KS Exclusive Player Marker and art print signed. Includes the Digital art book.
HP Lovecraft - KS Exclusive Player Marker and art print signed. Includes the Digital art book.
Collector - One faction figure set of choice, from the original base set of factions.
Cultist - Early Bird 1 - The Game – At this level, you’ll receive the Cthulhu Wars boxed game AND any Stretch Goals applicable! You will also receive the digital art book.
Cultist - Early Bird 2 - The Game – At this level, you’ll receive the Cthulhu Wars boxed game AND any Stretch Goals applicable! You will also receive the digital art book.

Cultist - The Game – At this level, you’ll receive the Cthulhu Wars boxed game AND any Stretch Goals applicable! You will also receive the digital art book. MSRP $169

Father's Day Special - A limited time offer only, receive $89 off of the retail price! You’ll receive everything in the Cultist level, plus the Opener of the Way expansion, Kickstarter Exclusive first player marker, 12 Custom Cthulhu Dice, and 16 plastic miniature gates AND any Stretch Goals applicable.

Cultes Des Goules - 
Early Bird  – At this level, you’ll receive everything in the Cultist level, plus the Opener of the Way expansion, Kickstarter Exclusive first player marker, 12 Custom Cthulhu Dice, and 16 plastic miniature gates AND any Stretch Goals applicable. All at a bundled price!

Cultes Des Goules - 
Early Bird 2 – At this level, you’ll receive everything in the Cultist level, plus the Opener of the Way expansion, Kickstarter Exclusive first player marker, 12 Custom Cthulhu Dice, and 16 plastic miniature gates AND any Stretch Goals applicable. All at a bundled price!

Cultes Des Goules - 
Early Bird 3 – At this level, you’ll receive everything in the Cultist level, the Opener of the Way expansion, Kickstarter Exclusive first player marker, 12 Custom Cthulhu Dice, and 16 plastic miniature gates AND any Stretch Goals applicable. All at a bundled price!

Cultes Des Goules - 
Early Bird 4 – At this level, you’ll receive everything in the Cultist level, the Opener of the Way expansion, Kickstarter Exclusive first player marker, 12 Custom Cthulhu Dice, and 16 plastic miniature gates AND any Stretch Goals applicable. All at a bundled price!

Cultes Des Goules - 
Early Bird 5 - At this level, you’ll receive everything in the Cultist level, the Opener of the Way expansion, Kickstarter Exclusive first player marker, 12 Custom Cthulhu Dice, and 16 plastic miniature gates AND any Stretch Goals applicable. All at a bundled price!

Cultes Des Goules - 
  At this level, you’ll receive everything in the Cultist level, plus the Opener of the Way expansion, Kickstarter Exclusive first player marker, 12 Custom Cthulhu Dice, and 16 plastic miniature gates AND any Stretch Goals applicable. All at a bundled price!

The Book of Eibon - Full Game, choice of "Asenath Waite" Player Marker OR "H.P. Lovecraft" Player Marker, 20 Custom Dice, 22 Plastic Gates, 9 Great Old Ones, High Priest Expansion, and choice of THREE from: Opener of the Way Expansion, The Sleeper Expansion, The Windwalker Expansion, Azathoth Expansion, Primeval Map Expansion, Yuggoth Map Expansion or Dreamlands Map Expansion. (Survey will be given at end to tally your choices.)

GenCon - Come Dine with the Elder Gods! Meet Sandy Petersen at GenCon on August 15-18, and have dinner with Sandy Petersen! You get to play the game before it comes out and you will receive all the items from the Cultes Des Goules tier signed by the team!

Necronomicon - Come Dine with the Elder Gods!
Meet Sandy Petersen at NecronomiCon on August 22-25, and have dinner with Sandy Petersen! You get to play the game before it comes out and you will receive all the items from the previous tier signed by the team!

De Vermiis Mysteriis - Get all gameplay items with this bundle:  Full Game, Opener of the Way Expansion, "Asenath Waite" Player Marker, "H.P. Lovecraft" Player Marker, 20 Custom Dice, 22 Plastic Gates, 9 Great Old Ones, High Priest Expansion, Dreamlands Underworld Monster Expansion, Dreamlands Surfaceworld Monster Expansion, The Sleeper Expansion, The Windwalker Expansion, Azathoth Expansion, Primeval Map Expansion, Yuggoth Map Expansion, Dreamlands Map Expansion, High Priest Expansion Pack  and 6-8 Player Map. (Does not include shirt or Faction art prints)
